lawnlayer

Class TileObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • lawnlayer.GameObject
      • lawnlayer.TileObject

  • public class TileObject
extends GameObject
    Represents a tile object in the tilemap.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TileObject(int row, int col)
      Creates a new tile object at coordinates calculated from specified row and column.

        public TileObject(int row,

        Creates a new tile object at coordinates calculated from specified row and column.
        Parameters:
        row - the row of this tile in the whole tilemap
        col - the column of this tile in the whole tilemap
